mapper.select: SELECT oi.`id` order_item_id, oi.`count` `count`, oi.`card_type`, oi.`frame_type`, oi.`frame_price`, oi.`trans_price`, oi.`print_no`, wi.`wid`, wi.`name` workName, wi.`picurl`, wi.`price` workPrice, wi.`wide`, wi.`high`, wi.`deep`, a.`id` artistId, a.`truename` artistName FROM t_order o LEFT JOIN t_orderitem oi ON o.id=oi.`oid` LEFT JOIN t_workitem wi ON oi.`wid`=wi.`wid` LEFT JOIN t_work w ON wi.`wid`=w.`id` LEFT JOIN t_artist a ON w.`uid`=a.`uid` WHERE o.uid = #{uid}
